title: Horrible Tragedy
body: <p><a href="http://www.sherrybdunn.com/" title="SherryBDunn.com">Sherry</a> was forced to buy an eMac for her job last night.  I tried to convince her that <a href="http://pearpc.net/" title="PearPC is pretty sweet IMO">PearPC</a> would be enough, but I guess it was just too slow on her junkware-laden pc (don't get me started on that). Aside from the DVD drive (her PC only has a burner), the only differences hardware-wise are that the eMac's processor is ~250MHz slower and it has half the RAM.  Oh yeah, and it was <em>twice</em> the cost of what I paid for her PC... 2 years ago. All because her source files used fonts that she doesn't have for her PC. *sigh* The PC can still be restarted twice in the time it takes for the eMac to boot up once.</p>
